ns:common.topic.description: In software design, model-driven integration is a subset of model-driven architecture which focuses purely on solving Application Integration problems using executable Unified Modeling Language.
rdfs:label: Model-driven integration

ns:common.document.text: In software design, model-driven integration is a subset of model-driven architecture (MDA) which focuses purely on solving Application Integration problems using executable Unified Modeling Language (UML).

ns:type.object.name: Model-driven integration
